headline: Is There an Opportunity in UDR After Recent Apartment Market Slowdown?
summary: If you are sizing up what to do with UDR stock right now, you are not alone. With shares closing at $36.22 in the last session, investors have some questions about its place in a modern portfolio. Should you interpret its recent drift, down just 0.1% in the last week and off by 4.1% over the past month, as a warning sign or could there be a fresh opportunity forming? Looking at the longer-term charts, UDR is down 14.8% so far this year and off by 15.6% over the past 12 months. Despite these...
